result.execSummary:
The defendant Sheila S Lott was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

civilJdgmts.propDescr: For the balance of Restitution and 10% surcharge still owed.

supervisions.notes:
Huber with standard release conditions.
Credit For Time Served 1 Day, If Revoked.
Can be transferred to Kenosha County as long as it is served in the Facility.
Can be transferred to Kenosha County.

miscConds.notes: Restitution:  $251.41, joint and several, without Co-Defendants to be paid as a Condition of Probation a the rate of $25.00 per month start 08-01-2014.

Cost and Surcharge to be paid as a Condition of Probation at the rate of $25.00 per month starting 08-01-2014; alternate 46 hours of Community Service to be completed by end of Probation.  Court must receive notice completion prior to end of Probation (due date).

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

Maintain contact with Dr. Hamilton
No use or possession of illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions.
Sign any/all Medical Releases for Agent.
Follow through with any recommendations by Agent.
Take a Criminal Thinking Course.
Operate a motor vehicle with a valid driver's license.
No contact with Woodman's In Menomonee Falls.

timeConds.notes: To serve during the First 10 months of Probation.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime
